segments.text: Egg , this bathroom is a pigsty !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Helen , why do you keep flushing the toilet ? What's wrong ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just can't stand it . It's really gross in here ! There ' s a stain on the toilet seat , and the floor was wet and slippery . So I cleaned it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You did what ? Helen , I know it's gross , but I ' Ve seen many public washrooms that are much worse . Why are you cleaning the counter top ? are you out of your mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't help myself ; it's just so disgusting in here !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Helen , this is not like your own bathroom . Just leave it to the cleaners , okay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hang on . I'm just gonna quickly wipe the sink and sweep the floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're such a neat freak ! I'm outta here !
segments.speaker: S2
